insert into book_library_infos (book_code, book_name, person_type, person_name, department_name, department_code, person_no, borrowed_time, returned_time, is_refill, created_at, updated_at, should_return_time, operate_type, payment_amount ) values (#{bookCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bookName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{personType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{borrowedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isRefill,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shouldReturnTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update book_library_infos set book_code = #{bookCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, book_name = #{bookName,jdbcType=CHAR}, person_type = #{personType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, person_name = #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_name = #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_code = #{departmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, person_no = #{personNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, borrowed_time = #{borrowedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, returned_time = #{returnedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_refill = #{isRefill,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, should_return_time = #{shouldReturnTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_amount = #{paymentAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, book_code, book_name, person_type, person_name, department_name, department_code, person_no, borrowed_time, returned_time, is_refill, created_at, updated_at, should_return_time, operate_type, payment_amount from book_library_infos where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
